name: Egg Incubator
description: A powered structure that allows precise control of fertilized egg incubation, adjusting temperature automatically for optimal hatching.

name: Managarmr Saddle
description: A saddle that allows survivors to ride and control the agile Managarmr, capable of frost breath and powerful leaps on Extinction.

name: Snow Owl Saddle
description: A saddle for the Snow Owl, enabling flight and the use of its healing freeze ability, found on Extinction.

name: Gacha Saddle
description: A saddle for the Gacha, allowing survivors to ride the creature which produces valuable resources through its crystals.

name: Mining Drill
description: A gasoline-powered tool that efficiently harvests metal, stone, flint, and other resources in large quantities.

name: Hazard Suit Boots
description: Protective boots that are part of the Hazard Suit, providing full radiation protection on Aberration.

name: Hazard Suit Gloves
description: Protective gloves that are part of the Hazard Suit, providing full radiation protection on Aberration.

name: Hazard Suit Shirt
description: A protective chest piece forming part of the Hazard Suit, essential for radiation-heavy zones on Aberration.

name: Hazard Suit Pants
description: Protective leggings from the Hazard Suit set, providing resistance against radiation on Aberration.

name: Hazard Suit Hat
description: A helmet forming part of the Hazard Suit set, offering full-body radiation shielding on Aberration.

name: Rock Drake Saddle
description: A saddle for the Rock Drake, a climbing and gliding creature found on Aberration, granting survivors control over its stealth and mobility.

name: Climbing Pick
description: A handheld tool that allows survivors to scale vertical surfaces and cliffs, vital for exploration on Aberration.

name: Wind Turbine
description: A structure that generates electricity in desert biomes, providing a renewable power source in place of generators.

name: Chainsaw
description: A gasoline-powered tool that excels at harvesting wood, thatch, and organic polymer efficiently.

name: Mantis Saddle
description: A saddle for the Mantis, a versatile creature that can wield melee weapons and tools when equipped.

name: Mirror
description: A decorative structure that allows survivors to place a reflective surface for cosmetic or roleplay purposes in their bases.

name: Rock Golem Saddle
description: A saddle for the Rock Elemental (Rock Golem), enabling survivors to ride and control this powerful siege creature on Scorched Earth.
